events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the amount charged.
The support system has classified this issue under refund requests based on the customer's message content.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to assist you in processing your refund as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and proceed?
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 457829, and attached is a clear photo showing the incorrect product delivered.
We have verified the error and will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate your quick help and look forward to receiving the refund soon. Thank you for resolving this issue efficiently.
Your refund request has been processed and closed from our side. Please check your account within a few days for the transaction.
Just following up to ensure that you have received the refund and that everything is now satisfactory on your side.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
